medical_service_assistance.title: Medical Service Assistance
medical_service_assistance.description: Free medical consultation and healthcare services for senior citizens in Davao City
medical_service_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of residence in Davao City
medical_service_assistance.applicationProcess: Visit DCMC or any participating health center with required documents

dswd_social_pension.title: DSWD Social Pension
dswd_social_pension.description: ₱500 monthly cash assistance for indigent senior citizens
dswd_social_pension.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of indigency, barangay certification
dswd_social_pension.applicationProcess: Submit application at DSWD Field Office XI with required documents
dswd_social_pension.contactInfo: DSWD Field Office XI: (082) 224-1234, JP Laurel Ave, Bajada

dswd_food_assistance.title: DSWD Food Assistance Program
dswd_food_assistance.description: Monthly food packs and nutritional support for senior citizens
dswd_food_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of need, barangay certification
dswd_food_assistance.applicationProcess: Register at DSWD Field Office XI or through barangay
dswd_food_assistance.contactInfo: DSWD Field Office XI: (082) 224-1234, JP Laurel Ave, Bajada

davao_housing_program.title: Davao City Housing Program for Seniors
davao_housing_program.description: Housing assistance and emergency shelter for senior citizens
davao_housing_program.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of housing need, income certificate
davao_housing_program.applicationProcess: Submit application at City Housing Office with required documents

annual_financial_assistance.title: Annual Financial Assistance
annual_financial_assistance.description: ₱3,000 yearly cash assistance during Christmas season
annual_financial_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of residence in Davao City
annual_financial_assistance.applicationProcess: Register at OSCA Davao during application period
annual_financial_assistance.contactInfo: OSCA Davao: (082) 222-1234, City Hall Ground Floor

senior_citizen_discount.title: Senior Citizen Discount
senior_citizen_discount.description: 20% discount on utilities, medicines, and transportation for senior citizens
senior_citizen_discount.applicationProcess: Present Senior Citizen ID at participating establishments
senior_citizen_discount.contactInfo: OSCA Davao: (082) 222-1234, City Hall Ground Floor

philhealth_senior_coverage.title: PhilHealth Senior Citizen Coverage
philhealth_senior_coverage.description: Free health insurance coverage for senior citizens
philhealth_senior_coverage.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, PhilHealth membership
philhealth_senior_coverage.applicationProcess: Register at PhilHealth office or online

sss_senior_pension.title: SSS Senior Citizen Pension
sss_senior_pension.description: Monthly pension for senior citizens aged 60 and above
sss_senior_pension.requirements: Valid ID, birth certificate, proof of age 60+, SSS membership
sss_senior_pension.applicationProcess: Visit nearest SSS office with required documents

transportation_assistance.title: Transportation Assistance
transportation_assistance.description: Free transportation services for medical appointments and government transactions
transportation_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, medical appointment slip or government transaction proof
transportation_assistance.applicationProcess: Call transportation hotline or visit OSCA office
transportation_assistance.contactInfo: OSCA Davao: (082) 222-1234, City Hall Ground Floor

utility_discounts.title: Utility Discounts
utility_discounts.description: 20% discount on electricity, water, and other utility bills
utility_discounts.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, utility account in senior's name
utility_discounts.applicationProcess: Present Senior Citizen ID at utility company office
utility_discounts.contactInfo: OSCA Davao: (082) 222-1234, City Hall Ground Floor

medication_assistance.title: Medication Assistance Program
medication_assistance.description: Free essential medications for senior citizens
medication_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, doctor's prescription

dental_services.title: Dental Services Assistance
dental_services.description: Free dental check-up and basic dental services for senior citizens
dental_services.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of residence in Davao City
dental_services.applicationProcess: Schedule appointment at DCMC dental clinic

emergency_financial_aid.title: Emergency Financial Aid
emergency_financial_aid.description: Emergency financial assistance for senior citizens in crisis situations
emergency_financial_aid.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of emergency situation, barangay certification
emergency_financial_aid.applicationProcess: Submit application at DSWD Field Office XI with supporting documents
emergency_financial_aid.contactInfo: DSWD Field Office XI: (082) 224-1234, JP Laurel Ave, Bajada

home_repair_assistance.title: Home Repair Assistance
home_repair_assistance.description: Financial assistance for home repairs and improvements for senior citizens
home_repair_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of home ownership, income certificate
home_repair_assistance.applicationProcess: Submit application at City Housing Office with required documents

legal_assistance.title: Legal Assistance Program
legal_assistance.description: Free legal consultation and assistance for senior citizens
legal_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID, valid ID, proof of legal issue
legal_assistance.applicationProcess: Schedule appointment at City Legal Office

funeral_assistance.title: Funeral Assistance Program
funeral_assistance.description: Financial assistance for funeral expenses of senior citizens
funeral_assistance.requirements: Senior Citizen ID of deceased, death certificate, funeral service receipt
funeral_assistance.applicationProcess: Submit application at OSCA Davao within 30 days of death
funeral_assistance.contactInfo: OSCA Davao: (082) 222-1234, City Hall Ground Floor
